name: Leads and Appointments
overview:
Providing qualified business leads and appointments is what leadsandappointnments.com is all about. Delivered by Callbox’ business lead generation and appointment setting experts. We just don’t deliver leads and appointments, we deliver it with passion. Helping our clients achieve their business goals through our lead generation and appointment setting campaigns is our commitment.

Callbox helps businesses increase sales by generating pre-qualified sales leads and appointments that shorten the sales cycle in acquiring and retaining new customers. Unlike other sales prospecting or telemarketing companies, Callbox combines traditional probing practices with innovative business prospecting techniques, thus effectively handling the first and most critical step in your sales cycle - information and opportunity management. By the time the lead is in your hands, you can devote your energies to closing the deal. As a matter of fact, we can set the appointment for you and write it into your schedule, and then call you up and remind you beforehand.

You can enjoy the benefits of our Lead Generation and Appointment Setting services anytime, anywhere via PipelineCRM, our multi-channel web-based CRM tool that integrates callcenter power, enabling managers and sales professionals to streamline business development.
